Interface TextFormatter

public interface TextFormatter
Interface for text formatting operations. Provides methods for common text transformations.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    TextFormatter.CaseConverter
    Inner interface for case conversion implementations.
    static enum 
    TextFormatter.CaseType
    Enum representing different text case formats.

      maxLength - the maximum length

      the truncated text

    • truncate

      String truncate(String text, int maxLength, String ellipsis)
      Truncates text with custom ellipsis.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      maxLength - the maximum length
      ellipsis - the ellipsis string to append
      Returns:
      the truncated text

    • pad

      String pad(String text, int length, char padChar, boolean padLeft)
      Pads text to specified length with a padding character.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      length - the desired length
      padChar - the character to use for padding
      padLeft - true to pad on the left, false to pad on the right
      Returns:
      the padded text

    • padLeft

      default String padLeft(String text, int length, char padChar)
      Pads text on the left to specified length.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      length - the desired length
      padChar - the character to use for padding
      Returns:
      the left-padded text

    • padRight

      default String padRight(String text, int length, char padChar)
      Pads text on the right to specified length.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      length - the desired length
      padChar - the character to use for padding
      Returns:
      the right-padded text

    • repeat

      String repeat(String text, int times)
      Repeats the text a specified number of times.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      times - the number of repetitions
      Returns:
      the repeated text

    • isBlank

      boolean isBlank(String text)
      Checks if the text is empty or contains only whitespace.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      Returns:
      true if empty or whitespace only, false otherwise

      String replaceAll(String text, String target, String replacement)
      Replaces all occurrences of a substring.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text
      target - the substring to replace
      replacement - the replacement string
      Returns:
      the text with replacements made

    • wrap

      Wraps text at specified line length.

      the wrapped text
